lines.gurmukhi: kwhU dsw ky pvn gvn kY brKw hY kwhU dsw ky pvn bwdr iblwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kaahoo Dasaa Kay Pavan Gavan Kai Barakhaa Hai , Kaahoo Dasaa Kay Pavan Baadar Bilaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as wind blowing from a particular direction causes rain while another direction blows the clouds away.

lines.gurmukhi: kwhU jl pwn kIey rhq Arog dohI kwhU jl pwn ibAwpy biRQw ibllwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kaahoo Jal Paan Keeay Rahat Arog Dohee , Kaahoo Jal Paan Biaapay Bridaa Bilalaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as drinking some water keeps the body healthy while some other water causes one to fall sick. It troubles the patient no end.

lines.gurmukhi: kwhU giH kI Agin pwk swk isiD krY kwhU giH kI Agin Bvnu jrwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kaahoo Grih Kee Agani Paak Saak Sidhi Karai , Kaahoo Grih Kee Agani Bhavanu Jaraat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as the fire of a house helps in cooking but the fire raged in another house burns the house to ashes'

lines.gurmukhi: kwhU kI sMgq imil jIvn mukiq huie kwhU kI sMgiq imil jmupuir jwq hY ]549]
lines.transliteration_english: Kaahoo Kee Sangat Mili Jeevan Moukati Hui , Kaahoo Kee Sangati Mili Jamoupuri Jaat Hai ?549?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly someone's company liberates, while other's company leads one to hell.  (549)
